title: Competition: Young & Lost Tote Bag/Compilation CD
content:
The good folk over at Young & Lost Club have been kind enough to send over one of their limited edition tote bags to give away to one lucky Crack In The Road reader, along with a CD Compilation album of some of Young & Lost Club‘s finest artists. All you’ve got to do to win this fantastic prize is to write the name of one Y&L Club artist/band on our Facebook Wall and tell us why you love them quite as much as you do. Get as many of your friends to then like the post, and the most liked post wins. Needless to say, haters need not apply.

And when you thought it couldn’t get any better, for every person who has even stumbled across this competition, you can download Oh Minnows’ track ‘Another Volunteer‘ for absolutely free. Head over to this Soundcloud link to stream and download the track, which is a fine example of the Oh Minnows‘ sound of climatic melodies and shadowing vocals. Make sure to check out their debut album For Shadows if you dig this track!
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
